objects.text:
• Height Adjustable Design
• Luxurious PU Padding
• Ergonomic Mid-Back Support
• Supports up to 275 pounds

product_details.description: Product Description          Amazon Basics Classic Puresoft PU-Padded Mid-Back Office Computer Desk Chair with Armrest - Cream             From the Manufacturer          Amazon Basics VERSATILE USE: Office desk chair for home office, work station, or conference room ADJUSTABLE COMFORT: Adjustable seat height, adjustable seat angle, and tilt control for customizable comfort STURDY CONSTRUCTION:Supports up to 275 pounds; sturdy KD metal base COMFORTABLE DESIGN:Puresoft PU upholstery in Black; contoured padded seat, backrest, and armrests for comfort; durable caster wheels for smooth-rolling mobility EASY ASSEMBLY:Assembly instructions included; components (casters, base, arms, seat mechanism, hardware kit) arrive packed in the back cushion PRODUCT SPECIFICATIONS: Product Dimensions: 23.75 x 26 x 38.25 - 42 inches (WxDxH); seat width: 19.5 inches; seat depth: 17.75 inches; arm height: 26.25 - 30 inches Brand - Amazon Basics ** Color - Cream ** Product Dimensions - 26"D x 23.75"W x 42"H ** Size - 26"D x 23.75"W x 42"H ** Back Style - Mid Back **

banner_details:
This square promotional banner showcases a modern office chair with an ergonomic and stylish design. The layout divides the background diagonally, creating a contrast between deep blue tones on the left and light grayish-blue on the right. The left section contains text layers: the prominent `heading` introducing the product, the `tagline` emphasizing comfort, a detailed `description` of key features, a `subheading` with the product name, a large `price` tag, and a call-to-action button composed of `cta_background` and `cta` text. The right side features the `product_image`, a white PU leather chair with black armrests and wheels, offering a clean, professional aesthetic.

**Color Palette:**
- Midnight Blue: #2C3E50  
- Dark Slate Blue: #34495E  
- Sky Blue: #3498DB  
- Ocean Blue: #2980B9  
- Light Gray: #ECF0F1  
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image showcases a sleek, modern office chair with a minimalist color scheme that balances elegance and professionalism. The primary color is a soft ivory white (#F1EFE8) used in the cushioned seat and backrest, exuding comfort and luxury. This is contrasted with deep matte black (#2B2B2B) in the chair's base, wheels, and armrests, adding strength and structure. The metal and plastic elements subtly incorporate shades of dark gray (#4C4C4C), blending smoothly into the overall look. Together, these colors create a harmonious, clean palette for an advertisement banner. Accent colors like silver gray (#A0A0A0) can highlight fine details.
